channel.title: CVE Feed for SonicWall -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SonicWall -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2323|2024-08-03T00:32:09.648Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20switch
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a user input allows an authenticated malicious user to perform remote code execution in the host system. This vulnerability impacts SonicWall Switch 1.1.1.0-2s and earlier versions

item.title: CVE-2022-1701|2024-08-03T00:10:03.912Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sma1000
item.description: SonicWall SMA1000 series firmware 12.4.0, 12.4.1-02965 and earlier versions uses a shared and hard-coded encryption key to store data.

item.title: CVE-2022-22282|2024-08-03T03:07:50.319Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sma1000
item.description: SonicWall SMA1000 series firmware 12.4.0, 12.4.1-02965 and earlier versions incorrectly restricts access to a resource using HTTP connections from an unauthorized actor leading to Improper Access Control vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-1702|2024-08-03T00:10:03.816Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sma1000
item.description: SonicWall SMA1000 series firmware 12.4.0, 12.4.1-02965 and earlier versions accept a user-controlled input that specifies a link to an external site and uses that link in a redirect which leads to Open redirection vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-22280|2024-08-03T03:07:50.162Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20gms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command leading to Unauthenticated SQL Injection vulnerability, impacting SonicWall GMS 9.3.1-SP2-Hotfix1, Analytics On-Prem 2.5.0.3-2520 and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-22277|2024-08-03T03:07:50.394Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS SNMP service resulting exposure of Wireless Access Point sensitive information in cleartext.

item.title: CVE-2022-2915|2024-08-03T00:52:59.534Z -- sonicwall -- sma100
item.description: A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in the SonicWall SMA100 appliance allows a remote authenticated attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) on the appliance or potentially lead to code execution. This vulnerability impacts 10.2.1.5-34sv and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2022-22275|2024-08-03T03:07:50.213Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Restriction of TCP Communication Channel in HTTP/S inbound traffic from WAN to DMZ bypassing security policy until TCP handshake potentially resulting in Denial of Service (DoS) attack if a target host is vulnerable.

item.title: CVE-2022-22278|2024-08-03T03:07:50.277Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS CFS (Content filtering service) returns a large 403 forbidden HTTP response message to the source address when users try to access prohibited resource this allows an attacker to cause HTTP Denial of Service (DoS) attack

item.title: CVE-2022-22274|2024-08-03T03:07:50.278Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via HTTP request allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) or potentially results in code execution in the firewall.

item.title: CVE-2022-22273|2024-08-03T03:07:50.311Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sra%2Fsma100
item.description: Improper neutralization of Special Elements leading to OS Command Injection vulnerability impacting end-of-life Secure Remote Access (SRA) products and older firmware versions of Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products, specifically the SRA appliances running all 8.x, 9.0.0.5-19sv and earlier versions and Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products running older firmware 9.0.0.9-26sv and earlier versions

item.title: CVE-2022-22276|2024-08-03T03:07:50.191Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: A vulnerability in SonicOS SNMP service resulting exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized user.

item.title: CVE-2022-22281|2024-08-03T03:07:50.181Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20netextender%20windows%20%2832%20and%2064%20bit%29%20client
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicWall SSL-VPN NetExtender Windows Client (32 and 64 bit) in 10.2.322 and earlier versions, allows an attacker to potentially execute arbitrary code in the host windows operating system.

item.title: CVE-2022-2324|2024-08-03T00:32:09.662Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20email%20security
item.description: Improperly Implemented Security Check vulnerability in the SonicWall Hosted Email Security leads to bypass of Capture ATP security service in the appliance. This vulnerability impacts 10.0.17.7319 and earlier versions

item.title: CVE-2022-22279|2024-08-03T03:07:50.200Z -- sonicwall -- sonicwall%20sra%2Fsma100
item.description: A post-authentication arbitrary file read vulnerability impacting end-of-life Secure Remote Access (SRA) products and older firmware versions of Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products, specifically the SRA appliances running all 8.x, 9.0.0.5-19sv and earlier versions and Secure Mobile Access (SMA) 100 series products running older firmware 9.0.0.9-26sv and earlier versions

item.title: CVE-2022-1703|2024-08-03T00:10:03.809Z -- sonicwall -- sma100
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements in the SonicWall SSL-VPN SMA100 series management interface allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject OS Commands which potentially leads to remote command execution vulnerability or denial of service (DoS) attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-08-02T04:39:54.567Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2024-22395|2024-08-01T22:43:34.918Z -- sonicwall -- sma100
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability has been identified in the SMA100 SSL-VPN virtual office portal, which in specific conditions could potentially enable a remote authenticated attacker to associate another user's MFA mobile application.

item.title: CVE-2024-22398|2024-08-01T22:43:34.875Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: An improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory (Path Traversal) vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security Appliance could allow a remote attacker with administrative privileges to conduct a directory traversal attack and delete arbitrary files from the appliance file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22394|2024-08-01T22:43:34.842Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description:
An improper authentication vulnerability has been identified in SonicWall SonicOS SSL-VPN feature, which in specific conditions could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication.
This issue affects only firmware version SonicOS 7.1.1-7040.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-08-01T22:43:34.943Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-22397|2024-08-01T22:43:34.948Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in the SonicOS SSLVPN portal allows a remote authenticated attacker as a firewall 'admin' user to store and execute arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-18T18:03:28.460Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-07-18T13:37:13.495Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-07-01T18:38:28.985Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-07-01T18:39:02.051Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-06-20T08:14:23.845Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-06-20T08:11:10.318Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-03-14T03:15:55.008Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-22397|2024-06-04T17:52:40.010Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in the SonicOS SSLVPN portal allows a remote authenticated attacker as a firewall 'admin' user to store and execute arbitrary JavaScript code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22394|2024-02-08T01:14:33.634Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description:
An improper authentication vulnerability has been identified in SonicWall SonicOS SSL-VPN feature, which in specific conditions could allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication.
This issue affects only firmware version SonicOS 7.1.1-7040.

item.title: CVE-2024-22398|2024-03-14T03:29:03.884Z -- sonicwall -- email%20security
item.description: An improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory (Path Traversal) vulnerability in SonicWall Email Security Appliance could allow a remote attacker with administrative privileges to conduct a directory traversal attack and delete arbitrary files from the appliance file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22395|2024-02-23T23:37:06.715Z -- sonicwall -- sma100
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability has been identified in the SMA100 SSL-VPN virtual office portal, which in specific conditions could potentially enable a remote authenticated attacker to associate another user's MFA mobile application.

item.title: CVE-2024-29010|2024-06-04T17:56:39.022Z -- sonicwall -- gms
item.description:
The XML document processed in the GMS ECM URL endpoint is vulnerable to XML external entity (XXE) injection, potentially resulting in the disclosure of sensitive information.
This issue affects GMS: 9.3.4 and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29011|2024-06-04T17:57:05.885Z -- sonicwall -- gms
item.description:
Use of hard-coded password in the GMS ECM endpoint leading to authentication bypass vulnerability.
This issue affects GMS: 9.3.4 and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-22396|2024-06-21T19:20:49.979Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: An Integer-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS via IPSec allows a remote attacker in specific conditions to cause Denial of Service (DoS) and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted IKEv2 payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-40764|2024-07-18T07:42:37.995Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS IPSec VPN allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-18T07:37:12.258Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-18T16:38:47.259Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-07-19T03:55:38.296Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29010|2024-08-02T01:03:51.475Z -- sonicwall -- gms
item.description:
The XML document processed in the GMS ECM URL endpoint is vulnerable to XML external entity (XXE) injection, potentially resulting in the disclosure of sensitive information.
This issue affects GMS: 9.3.4 and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29014|2024-08-02T01:03:51.738Z -- sonicwall -- netextender
item.description: Vulnerability in SonicWall SMA100 NetExtender Windows (32 and 64-bit) client 10.2.339 and earlier versions allows an attacker to arbitrary code execution when processing an EPC Client update.

item.title: CVE-2024-29011|2024-08-02T01:03:51.499Z -- sonicwall -- gms
item.description:
Use of hard-coded password in the GMS ECM endpoint leading to authentication bypass vulnerability.
This issue affects GMS: 9.3.4 and earlier versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29013|2024-08-02T01:03:51.681Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS SSL-VPN allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via memcpy function.

item.title: CVE-2024-29012|2024-08-02T01:03:51.511Z -- sonicwall -- sonicos
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the SonicOS HTTP server allows an authenticated remote attacker to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via sscanf function.
